import Avatar from '../../assets/default-avatar.png'; const Testimonials = () => { return (

A genuine, smart, creative team that listened and provided straightforward feedback on things we needed to change A genuine, smart, creative team that listened and provided straightforward feedback on things we needed to change

Jim Beiting
CEO, Transitions, Inc

They understand how to be creative, fresh, and high-end without feeling clichedThey understand how to be creative, fresh, and high-end without feeling clichedThey understand how to be creative, fresh, and high-end without feeling cliched

Kelli Dimmer
Administrator, Restaurant Chain
) } export default Testimonials;
